attributes.action: Change the Law to outlaw the current situation that pervades every walk of life in that there is a Law for one and a Law for another.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no such thing as equality within British Society. Day to day situations faced by the ordinary person often mean that one is not faced with a level "playing field". I do not need to illustrate this fact for every person who reads this petition will have met the same problem many times in his or her lifetime. A Law for one and a Law for another must be stamped out in Law, Business, gender, age, religion,  politics and every other walk of life.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
